Methods

applyArt

(
  • art
)

Defined in pixi/plugins/particles/cloudkid/Particle.hx:100

Sets the texture for the particle. This can be overridden to allow for an animated particle.

Parameters:

  • art pixi.textures.Texture

    The texture to set.

destroy

()

Defined in pixi/plugins/particles/cloudkid/Particle.hx:108

Destroys the particle, removing references and preventing future use.

init

()

Defined in pixi/plugins/particles/cloudkid/Particle.hx:114

Initializes the particle for use, based on the properties that have to have been set already on the particle.

kill

()

Defined in pixi/plugins/particles/cloudkid/Particle.hx:121

Kills the particle, removing it from the display list and telling the emitter to recycle it.

update

(
  • delta
)
Float

Defined in pixi/plugins/particles/cloudkid/Particle.hx:128

Updates the particle.

Parameters:

  • delta Float

    Time elapsed since the previous frame, in seconds.

Returns:

Float:

The standard interpolation multiplier (0-1) used for all relevant particle properties. A value of -1 means the particle died of old age instead.

Properties

acceleration

pixi.geom.Point

Defined in pixi/plugins/particles/cloudkid/Particle.hx:6

Acceleration to apply to the particle.

age

Float

Defined in pixi/plugins/particles/cloudkid/Particle.hx:12

The current age of the particle, in seconds.

ease

Void->Void

Defined in pixi/plugins/particles/cloudkid/Particle.hx:18

A simple easing function to be applied to all properties that are being interpolated.

emitter

Emitter

Defined in pixi/plugins/particles/cloudkid/Particle.hx:25

The emitter that controls this particle.

endAlpha

Float

Defined in pixi/plugins/particles/cloudkid/Particle.hx:31

The alpha of the particle at the end of its life.

endScale

Float

Defined in pixi/plugins/particles/cloudkid/Particle.hx:38

The scale of the particle at the start of its life.

endSpeed

Number

Defined in pixi/plugins/particles/cloudkid/Particle.hx:44

The speed of the particle at the end of its life.

extraData

Dynamic

Defined in pixi/plugins/particles/cloudkid/Particle.hx:50

Extra data that the emitter passes along for custom particles.

maxLife

Float

Defined in pixi/plugins/particles/cloudkid/Particle.hx:56

The maximum lifetime of this particle, in seconds.

startAlpha

Float

Defined in pixi/plugins/particles/cloudkid/Particle.hx:62

The alpha of the particle at the start of its life.

startColor

Array

Defined in pixi/plugins/particles/cloudkid/Particle.hx:68

The tint of the particle at the start of its life.

startScale

Float

Defined in pixi/plugins/particles/cloudkid/Particle.hx:74

The scale of the particle at the start of its life.

startSpeed

Float

Defined in pixi/plugins/particles/cloudkid/Particle.hx:80

The speed of the particle at the start of its life.

velocity

pixi.geom.Point

Defined in pixi/plugins/particles/cloudkid/Particle.hx:86

The velocity of the particle. Speed may change, but the angle also contained in velocity is constant.
